head.supplied: [We owe some Australian printed matter to the kindness of our famous compatriot at the antipodes, Baron Ferdinand von Muller in Melbourne. One is a number of the "Oueenscliff Sentinal" with a report o...

div.p:
Letter not found. The text given here is from 'Australisches', Gartenflora , vol. 43 (1894), pp. 472-3. It is dated to late June as the latest that it could have been sent to be included in the second of two issues for August (Issues are not dated, but the structure is consistent and this is the 16th of 24 issues for the year). The item is signed 'Tr', who has not been identified.
[Der Freundlichkeit unseres berühmten Landsmannes bei den Antipoden, des Barons Ferdinand von Müller in Melbourne, verdanken wir einige australische Drucksachen. So eine Nummer des "Queenscliff Sentinal" mit einem Berichte über die dortige Blumenschau am 25. November 1893.... Die zweite Drucksache ist eine Nummer des "Victorian Naturalist", einer kleinen Zeitschrift für den süd-australischen Naturfreund....]

p.seg: [We owe some Australian printed matter to the kindness of our famous compatriot at the antipodes, Baron Ferdinand von Muller in Melbourne. One is a number of the "Oueenscliff Sentinal" with a report on the local flower show on 25 November 1893.... The second printed item is a number of the "Victorian Naturalist", a small journal for southern Australian naturalists....]

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: The article includes comments on the report of the flower show and summarizes an item by M in the issue of the
which, from the names of species involved, must have been B93.04.02. The article concludes:

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 9pt; margin-left: 0.5in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: Auch erfahren wir, dass Herr von Müller von einer Anzahl europäischer, meist französischer Gesellschaften zum Ehrenmitgliede und Directeur gewählt wurde. Das darf uns um so mehr freuen, da wir wissen, dass unsere Fachgenossen jenseits der Vogesen deutsche Gründlichkeit und deutsche Kenntnisse auch dann zu schätzen wissen, wenn dieselben ihnen nicht auf dem Umwege über Australien geboten werden.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 9pt; margin-left: 0.5in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
p.seg: [We also learn that Mr. von Müller has been elected honorary member and director by a number of European, mostly French, societies. We would be all the more pleased, as we know that our colleagues beyond the Vosges appreciate German thoroughness and German knowledge, if they were not offered to them indirectly via Australia.]

p.style: font-family: Geneva; margin-left: 0.3346in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: -0.3346in; font-size: 9pt;
p.seg: The flower show was held on 18 November 1893 and reported in the
